00043 typedef struct fa_archiveinfo_t fa_archiveinfo_t;

00046 {
00047         FA_MODE_READ = 0,
00048         FA_MODE_WRITE = 1
00049 } fa_mode_t;
00050 
00051 typedef enum
00052 {
00053         FA_SEEK_SET = 0,
00054         FA_SEEK_CURR = 1,
00055         FA_SEEK_END = 2
00056 } fa_seek_t;

00058 typedef enum
00059 {
00060         FA_ENTRY_FILE = 0,
00061         FA_ENTRY_DIR = 1,
00062 } fa_entrytype_t;

00064 struct fa_dirinfo_t
00065 {
00066         const char* name; 
00068         fa_entrytype_t type;
00069         fa_compression_t compression;
00070

00072         {
00073                 uint32_t original;
00074                 uint32_t compressed;
00075         } size;
00076 
00077         fa_hash_t hash;
00078 };

00081 {
00082         fa_header_t header;
00083         fa_footer_t footer;
00084 };
